extendedInfo.description: "My First step" is series of applications build to help kids/ toddlers in learning the basic of an education in fun and interactive way. The idea behind these applications is to let the kids see, touch, feel and listen various voices and correlate them with a picture making the learning very easy.As a part of this series we present the first application called "Animal Voices". A user can touch the various animal faces in the application and listen the voices of same. Further they can click on the information button and application open detail information about the selected animal. One can also set the animal photo as wall paper of mobile.We are sure your kinds are going to love it. Enjoy and do not forget to send us your feedback at concoct.services@gmail.comKeywords: kids, education, animal, birds, voice, sound, zoo, toddler, learning, montessoriv 2.31) Now enjoy puzzle for kids. 2) Bug Fixed and better performancev2.2.21) Bug Fixes2) Better Performancev2.2.11) View animal information2) Quick replay optionv2.1.21) As per Feedback, Wallpaper options moved to menu's.v2.1.11) Share App with Friends via Facebook2) Direct feedback option3) Rate Application on Market4) Better graphics for all screensv2.1.01) Bug Fixing2) Adding Alligator, Bat, Camel, Crow and Horsev2.0.11) Minor UI improvements2) Adding Whalev2.01) Change View Type2) Support for more languages - Dutch, Spanish, French, Korean, Japanese, Italian, Portuguese, German3) Set animal image as wallpaper4) Adding more animals - Bee, Duck, mosquito, nightangle, owl, parrot, peacock, rhinoceros, seagull, vulture, woodpecker5) Replay animal voice
